Method.name: CorrectCTTestSet
Method.Implementation: set horolog=$h set ts="" for { set ts=$order(^TTAB("TS",ts),1,rec) if ts="" quit set name=$piece(rec,"\",1),reportname=$piece(rec,"\",17) if reportname="" continue set ^TTAB("TS",ts,"LAN",20)=reportname set $piece(^TTAB("TS",ts),"\",17)="*" set ^log("correctTestSet",horolog,ts)="reportname="_reportname }
